docs.abstract: David W Dunlap Building Blocks column; free-standing pavilion that serves as roof over Arthur Ashe Stadium in Queens has been completed and will be in service at 2016 United States Open tennis tournament; stadium was originally designed without roof, and pavilion forms example of elegant structural problem-solving.
